Description: Group of diseases that affect the heart and blood vessels.
Heart condition resulting from untreated streptococcal infections, leading to heart valve inflammation and damage.
Reduction in blood supply to the heart muscle due to coronary artery narrowing, leading to chest pain or heart attack.
Stroke is a sudden interruption in the blood supply to part of the brain.
High blood pressure leading to heart damage and increased risk of heart-related issues.
Infection of the heart's inner lining, often caused by bacteria, leading to heart valve damage and complications.
Heart valve disorders not related to rheumatic fever, affecting blood flow within the heart.
heart disease caused by chronic alcohol abuse that can lead to heart failure.
Myocarditis is a type of inflammation of the heart muscle
Myocarditis is a type of inflammation of the heart muscle
